http://imdb.com/title/tt0038355/

-DogNo7

[I loathe the Pbay's imdb entry field validation.  It sucks limp weenies.]

Dude!  You include 20 minutes of DVD bonus material, some of which is very interesting, particularly the scene-by-scene differences between the pre-release and initial release versions of the movie BUT THERE IS NO AUDIO!!!!  Can you possibly correct this?  I'd really love to have those extras!
A true classic thank you uploader....                A10/V10
